name: next-middy-monorepo
description: Type-safe, composable middleware framework for Next.js API routes with optional Zod integration.
author: Eugene Odeluga <eodeluga@users.noreply.github.com> (https://github.com/eodeluga)

scripts.bootstrap: echo '📦 Installing workspace deps…' && yarn install --silent && echo '✅ Dependencies linked.'
scripts.build: echo '🏗️ Building…' && tsc -b packages/next-middy/tsconfig.json && echo '✅ Build complete.'
scripts.clean: echo '🧹 Cleaning…' && find . \( -name 'coverage' -o -name '.vitest-cache' -o -name 'dist' -o -name 'node_modules' \) -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -type f -name '*.tsbuildinfo' -delete && echo '✅ Clean complete.'
scripts.rebuild: yarn run clean && yarn install && yarn run build
